name: Need for Speed: High Stakes
description:
Need for Speed: High Stakes is a racing-arcade game developed by Electronic Arts Canada and Electronic Arts Seattle. It came out on 01-03-1999. It was published by Electronic Arts. On review aggregator Metacritic, Need for Speed: High Stakes has a score of 86. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Need for Speed: High Stakes is available on PlayStation and PC.
Tony Parkes produced the game. It was scored by Crispin Hands, Rom Di Prisco and Saki Kaskas.
